Class KrystalServlet

java.lang.Object
jakarta.servlet.GenericServlet
jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServlet
krystal.framework.tomcat.KrystalServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Servlet, jakarta.servlet.ServletConfig, Serializable
@WebServlet(asyncSupported=true) public class KrystalServlet extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServlet
Builder of asynchronous (non-blocking) HttpServlet, utilising Virtual Threads. Remember to define mappings. API context pattern: server:port/contextPath/servletMapping.
mappings
Url patterns of /foo/bar, the servlet will respond to, after servletContextString. If any not provided - default: "/"
initParameters
Equivalents of GenericServlet.getInitParameter(String).
servletName
Default: unnamedServlet
servletContextString
Root mapping for Tomcat context.
Default:
invalid reference 
TomcatProperties#getDefaultServletsContext()
= "/api"
init
To run as GenericServlet.init().
destroy
To run as GenericServlet.destroy().
See Also:
